reviews.text: I highly recommend Gotcha Covered Contracting DFW for their exceptional service. They successfully completed a bathroom and kitchen remodel for us. Following a bathroom flood a few months after the remodel, we promptly contacted Juan Lopez, who arrived the same day to assess the damage. Their professionalism, cleanliness, honesty, and fair pricing are truly commendable.

We had work done on our outdated kitchen, as well as painting of the entire interior of our home.  New countertops, backsplash, painting of the cabinets.  I can't say enough about Chris, Fernando and their team as they worked through the project.  Very attentive and communicated very well each step of the way.  Kept things as clean as possible during the process and kept me from stressing too much!  Will definitely be hiring them again for future projects!!  5 stars!

Had a bad hail storm and ended up with lots of damage. I have never needed a roof replaced before so I didn't know what to expect. Juan took care of everything from start to finish. He met with my insurance adjuster and made sure they covered everything that needed repair. I don't ever want to have to replace my roof again but if I do, I'd definitely call Juan with Gotcha Covered again!

While in the process of selling our home it was determined we needed a new roof and fencing repairs, Chris and his team we're able to get us taken care quickly and professionally best part is it didn't delay are closing of our home. I would definitely recommend Chris and his team @ Gotcha Covered. Hope to do business again in the future.

☆☆
Unfortunate update:
We had the company back out to help us with replacing & moving part of our fence. There were so many communication errors that the Monday start date was pushed to Wednesday, not finished on Thursday (communication issues again), they were supposed to come Saturday to finish. We confirmed Saturday morning that they would be by at 230p. 330p, still no one, so I text to get an update - was read at 4p, but wasn't replied to until 930 that evening saying they would be by Monday

Colin and Raymond came right out and gathered all issues that needed to be repaired for a quote. Colin fought our insurance company and they quickly got everything covered under our insurance. Now we have the prettiest onyx black roof. I would absolutely choose them over and over again! Very professional company. Everyone was so amazing!! I love this company!

I’m so thankful for Chris! We had a horrible wind storm last night that damaged our roof. He came out the same day and had a crew already fixing the roof. This company is amazing! I highly recommend. They’re honest, professional, and their work is top tier. Thank you for everything!

From start to finish everyone I came into contact with was professional and courteous. Juan came out and gave me detailed description of the work to be done, it was done quickly and with great care.  Juan kept in constant contact with me every step of the way.  Thanks so much y'all!!

I am very satisfied with the work that was done on my home by Gotcha Covered. Chris will make sure that you are pleased with the results and if not he will make it good. I highly recommend this company to anyone who needs repairs!!’

From start to finish Juan and his team did a tremendous job in keeping me up to date and addressing all of my concerns during my restoration project. They worked closely with my insurance company to make sure I was reimbursed properly. In the end I was very happy with the finished project and would highly recommend them to anyone. Extremely professional in every aspect!

We are so pleased with Juan and Gotcha Covered contracting.  Juan went way beyond the call of duty.  He is amazing to work with.  Helped make this experience easy.  All the workers did a great job.  I highly recommend this company

Cory Walters and his team did a great job replacing my roof and on my home improvements.  They rebuilt my leaky chimney, painted the exterior, repaired sheetrock and rotted window frames, and completed large segments of the fence. Cory will be my go-to for any future home improvements.

We had GCC come out and replace an old metal patio awning, soffit & fascia. Juan was the project manager and he did an excellent job preparing the quote and double-checked the materials to ensure we'd have enough before work began. The office staff sent multiple emails to keep us informed with pictures at every step of the process. The crew was excellent. They left our yard clean and did a thorough job. We now have a fresh new patio awning and we are extremely pleased.

Edit: We loved working wi

Very professional and detail oriented.
Juan, our project manager, listened to our concerns and asks and he and the crew went out of their way to make it right for us . It took some time and was messy but it was worth it.
They did roofing, siding repair, gutters, painting. They also did some internal textured sheet rock repair for us and the results were amazing.
Highly recommend this company.

I needed a roof repaired. Chris came out quickly and gave an accurate assessment with photos. They got it fixed asap and at a good price. Chris is a solid guy and I will be using this company from now on.

Outstanding roofing company.  The attention to detail Chris has while making a claim is superior to most.  Chris in particular is extremely easy to get a hold of.  Chris always answers the phone and quick to answer all of my questions.  The smoothest new roof process I have seen.

The team at Gotcha Covered is top-notch. Colin and Juan were very responsive and consistently communicated with us at every step of the project. They, along with one of the owners of the company, were present throughout the process, managing the work their subconsultants were performing. The Gotcha team has the knowledge and drive to get the job done. In my opinion, one of the tasks on our project required way more effort than originally estimated, and I was pleasantly surprised to see that they

100% recommend them! Our previous contractor was not very responsive and was overinflating the prices to our insurance company. Called Juan. He and his guys came out quickly, got a great, honest quote and they have been doing wonderful work. The guys are all very nice and we will use them from now on! They did drywall, paint, flooring install, insulation and work in our garage from a pipe burst.

Let me just say that we had an excellent experience with Gotcha Covered from beginning to end.
In the past few months, 3 of my neighbors down the street have used this company. I had a chance to talk to each of them and they expressed how happy they are about the work and the professionalism and what a great job was done that I knew that this was the company that my husband and I wanted to go with.
One of my neighbors gave me a card for Colin Bartlett, project manager for Gotcha Covered and he a

Colin was amazing. He was honest, walked me through my options and didn’t oversell. I never felt pressured to make a particular decision/purchase. He and the rest of the GCC team worked within my schedule. I’m happy with the work that was done and will definitely recommend GCC to my friends and neighbors.

Gotcha Covered was so great & easy to work with! They worked fast to get everything squared away with insurance, had their team out within a week of us deciding on shingle color and even monitored the entire installation process. We had a question after the installation and the owner of the company responded immediately to make sure we were taken care of. Additionally, their team members truly care about their customers- my wife was in the hospital before the installation and they reached out ev

The crew at Gotcha Covered Contracting were very friendly and professional! The work thet did on our house was amazing! They made the house look new again! Juan Lopez walked me through everything they were going to do and added what I also needed done. Fernando is a master at his craft, im sorry I can't remember the other gentleman that worked his butt off too! Thank you guys! God bless! And thank you GCC for your work.

So lucky to have found Gotcha Covered through a referral from our solar panel company.  Colin Bartlett has been on top of everything the entire process.  From working with insurance, coordinating with solar panel company, being on site the date of installation, to follow up to make sure we were satisfied with the quality of the installation and the product.  I would recommend this company and Colin to everyone!

Colin at Gotcha Covered was so helpful when we needed a new roof. His team did a fantastic job and our new roof is perfect! We highly recommend Colin and his team and will definitely use them for future projects!

Awesome company! Chris is a rockstar that will do everything to make you happy with the finished product even putting forth extra effort to successfully make your house better than before. I’ve used them twice. The second time I started with another company and it was a mistake. Got You Covered came in, fixed the mistakes of the other company, got my insurance company to give me more money for my repairs, and got me in a good spot. I definitely recommend them!!

Contacted Chris, he came out went over the entire job of replacing the metal roof on a commercial building. He took his time to match the new paint job on the building for the gutters and we got a better roof installation and job than I was expecting. Everything from estimate, planning to installation and follow ups as fantastic. I would recommend Chris and Gotcha Covered for anything.

Colin Bartlett was very professional and communicated extensively.  He handled the entire claims process, I only spoke to insurance company a couple times when payment was being processed.  He did no stop untill my insurance company approved the entire roof, that was 100 percent needed!  Recommend them and will use them again in the future.

I’ve worked with this company for almost a decade and from the top all the way down, they’re a class act. It’s extremely hard to find any Company that genuinely puts customer service and quality above all else and these guys do. I highly recommend Gotcha Covered Contracting.

I met John Maurice, Sales Manager for Gotcha Covered Contracting when he knocked on my door after a hail storm had hit the area.  There had been a parade of roofers coming by but I sent them all away.  John and his team were the only ones wearing the required safety vest that displayed their credentials indicating that they had registered with the City of Bedford, TX to solicit.  They were the only company that I allowed to inspect my roof.  The roof was fine but I needed some fascia repaired an

I am excited about my repair on my barn. The barn looks brand new. You can't tell where the old and new begin and end. They cleaned up at the end. The workers were knowledgeable, friendly and committed to their work. I would hire them to do work for me again.

My compliments to Gotcha Covered for replacing our roof shingles. Juan, the person assigned to the job, was very professional and knowledgeable of the whole process. He  gave me and my wife the peace of mind needed before, during and after completion of the job. Thank you.

John, Eric, Collin & Chris were awesome. They never gave up on us or the insurance company after they denied the 1st claim. We love our new roof!! Our neighbors are commenting on how lovely the color is. Driftwood. Definitely recommend Gotcha Covered for your roofing needs.

Extremely helpful with getting through Allsate  Insurance.  Scheduled and completed everything on schedule as promised.  Very fair on pricing and communicated with us to keep us appraised at all times so no surprises. Would give them more stars if we could.

Colin from Gotcha Covered Contracting made my dreams come true! I know it sounds a little crazy, but hear me out. After being denied by my insurance company for a new roof months ago under the guidance of another roofing contactor my claim was denied. I had lost hope until Colin came to my door. He and his team not only got my claim approved for the roof, but the gutters too! Now my house has transformed into my dream house. Colin went above and beyond for me. I couldn't be happier. So thank you

This was the third time I've had a roof replaced and the first time I didn't have to pick up nails and little pieces of shingles off the sidewalks, out of flowerbeds, etc. From initial contact through completion,  management was professional and efficient. Their crew was respectful and considerate of our property.

The roof looks great. Gotcha Covered did a stand-up job. Highly recommend.

Gotcha Covered replaced rotted and warped wood on the exterior of my home for the soffits, facia boards and patio ceiling.  I loved working with this group, very professional and accommodating.  They took good care of my home and kept me informed of progress each day.  This is my new go to company for exterior home repairs.  In my experience its hard to find a company to do the work exactly to your liking without making it difficult, this company listened to what I wanted and did exactly that!

I had the exterior wood and trim of my home painted, and new gutters installed. Colin was great to work with and Gotcha Covered provided reasonable prices with great service. I am very happy with the work that was provided.

My gutters were damaged in a storm. Jimmie Mathews helped me get the repair done in a timely manner and they made sure I was 100% satisfied before completing the job. Now my gutters look better by than before. Highly recommend this business and get Jimmie if you can!

We had our roof repaired as well as the interior ceiling repaired and interior painted. Everyone was so nice and informative, answered all of our questions and communicated with us through the entire process. Even the contractors that did the work were very nice and respectful and fixed the smallest nailhole that was missed.

Highly recommend this company.  I had a small job, so I wasn't sure they would assist.  Not only did they assist me, I will now go to them for any further roofing needs down the line.  They have earned my business by providing quality work, being extremely professional, and having competitive pricing. A++

The salesman Colin was excellent through out the whole process and Gotcha Covered Contracting was professional and did and excellent job repairing our roof. I would highly recommend this company for all your roofing needs. Top quality company!

Gotcha Covered Contracting did our roof last year. Dealt with owner Joe Hamilton. Experience was excellent and Joe took care of the insurance adjusters and kept me informed through the whole process. They kept the property clean. Roof looks great!!!

I had a very good experience with Gotcha Covered Contracting. They were ready to do whatever was necessary to assist in working with the insurance company and contacting the shingle mfg. for a review of warranty.
The Gotchacovered Group was an excellent choice for our roof resurface. The communication and follow through were outstanding, and they showed up on time and the charges were very reasonable.

Even while going through a family emergency. Chris Juan and company were very attentive to our needs and flexible even if were were not able to be home. They always stayed in close contact. They were trustworthy and did an excellent job!
Reached out and spoke to Juan Lopez and the office lady Shayna. Great people! 5 stars!

This is a great company with professional and experienced crews. They do an excellent job for a great price. They work well with insurance companies to make sure you get the best deal possible. I would highly recommend this company to anyone in need of roofing repair or replacement.

John was great! Super responsive and honestly I didn’t think that our work would be done so quick! I received the quote on Monday and the work was completed by Thursday. I would definitely use this company again.

If I could give 10 stars I would, they were very professional, Colin and his team did a great job with all my roofing needs, the work was great but even more the communication was top notch and I’d definitely refer anyone to this company and Colin, by far the best experience I’ve ever had with a company

Asked for someone to come out and replace some wood rot under the siding of my house. After a week... They send out someone they contracted, not bonded, insured, or licensed. In a busted up (windshield and doors broken) civilian van with 2 random guys. I asked how they would fix it. They said (I think... Uh... I think you do it in 2 parts). Its a load baring wall. In no way will I work with a company so unprofessional. Not even a company really. Just sent 2 guys in a busted van and wanted $700+
